notes.title: Authors' contributions
notes.p: All authors were involved in the study concept. CG, CRC, MP, DB, and JC were involved in the design of the study. CG, CRC, SN, MA-G, IM, CMG, MA, and JMC were responsible for the recruitment and follow-up of the patients as well as data collection. ME was responsible for the creation of the randomisation list. MP was responsible for the randomisation and the coordination of the lock solution preparation in the two pharmacy departments. DB was responsible for the microbiological analyses of the study. CG, SN, and JC drafted and revised the manuscript. All authors reviewed and approved the final version of the manuscript.
